title: Crave
description:
From the international bestselling author comes a raw, intense romance that will leave you on the edge of your seat. 
He took everything I had to give. And now I’m craving more.
SamaelBorn and bred to be a monster. I never knew love. I reveled in doling out pain.I should train her. But she took more than I gave. She stole my heart.AngelStolen. Locked Away. Trained.I was meant to be his toy.I should hate him.But I gave him more than just my body. I offered him my heart. *This is a dark romance, suitable for mature audiences.
author: Dani René
